Poco

template < class TArgs, class TMutex = FastMutex >

class BasicEvent

Library: Foundation
Package: Events
Header: Poco/BasicEvent.h

Description

A BasicEvent uses the DefaultStrategy which invokes delegates in the order they have been registered.

Please see the AbstractEvent class template documentation for more information.

Inheritance

Direct Base Classes: AbstractEvent < TArgs, DefaultStrategy < TArgs, AbstractDelegate < TArgs > >, AbstractDelegate < TArgs >, TMutex >
